fingerprint-login-agreement.title: Fingerprint Login Agreement
data:
To enable Fingerprint Login for sign in, you are required to save your Online ID for this device. Once Fingerprint Login is enabled, you understand and agree that any fingerprint stored on this device can be used to access any of your accounts in Mobile Banking.

PenFed neither controls the functionality of Fingerprint Login nor has access to your fingerprint information.

There may be circumstances where Fingerprint Login will not function as expected and we may ask you to sign in using your password and username.
